channel.title: Threeleaf village is recruiting!!
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Threeleaf village is recruiting!!" - The Village Hidden in Jinx O.o

item.title: Re: Threeleaf village is recruiting!!
item.content:encoded:
We need lots more members so we can get all the great upgrades :)
ps. the village upkeep tax is super low - only 5%!!! oh my goodness!!!
come check it out!!

item.title: Threeleaf village is recruiting!!
item.content:encoded:
Can't seem to catch a break?
Fret not.
Need a place to lay low while you get the cops off your back?
Fret not.
Have a gambling addiction, and have been bankrupt three-ways to Tuesday?
Fret not.
For here in the village of the Three Leaf Clovers, all are welcomed.
Except for maybe the elite, we just hate those guys.

Heh heh.
Join Threeleaf Village! Watch it grow from the beginning! (aww. little baby!) Archduke (leader) doesn't seem to mind giving bribes, either, for those in the village who help out. hee hee hee - should I have said that?
Anyway, I'm sure it'll be a lot of fun. Come join!
